page.title: 13PRE SCHOOL EDUCATION
page.content: THERE ARE 40 CHILDREN AT{TODDLER {GROUP}.THEY ARE AGED 0 TO 5 AND THERE IS A PAINTING EASEL,A WENDY HOUSE,A ROCKING HORSE,DOUGH,A CLIMBING FRAME AND BOOKS.THEY GO ON OUTINGS AND THEY MEET ON THURSDAYS IN TERM TIME.THE GROUP IS 8\ YEARS OLD.THE{RISING FIVES HAVE 10 CHILDREN AND 2 SUPERVISORS THAT TAKE CHILDREN WHO ARE ABOUT TO GO TO THE PRIMARY SCHOOL AND PREPARE THEM FOR THAT.IT MEETS ONCE A WEEK.THE{ {VILLAGE HALL PLAYGROUP}CATERS FOR 24 CHILDREN AGED 3 TO 5. IT MEETS 4 MORNINGS A WEEK BETWEEN 9.15 AND 12.15 AND THERE ARE 4 ADULTS WHO HELP.{HOLY {INNOCENTS PLAYGROUP}IS HELD IN THE PARISH ROOMS AND ALSO CATERS FOR THE THREE TO FIVE AGE GROUP. THERE IS A NURSERY SCHOOL AT{CHRIST'S HOSPITAL } FOR THE THREE TO FIVES.
